verbose_text: Glucose influx under control conditions (lacking D-fructose) was a hyperbolic function of [D-glucose] and followed the Michaelis-Menten equation (Eqn 1) for carrier mediated transport.
evidence: Glucose influx under control conditions (lacking D-fructose) was a hyperbolic function of [D-glucose] and followed the Michaelis-Menten equation (Eqn 1) for carrier-mediated transport
